body: Did not read this to fap, I cannot fap to this, it's simply too beautiful and wholesome. Fuck, I'm in tears

Hey I'll put this on each of the 4 works The CT team has worked on as of right now(we starting a 5th one soon) and there's a reason we are the crappy translators, we are not professionals. we are not paid to do this(unless stated otherwise for a specific comment if we ever do that). I started it just because I did't want to pay someone for a translation and wanted to share the rough understanding of the sauce, it's not perfect in the slightness but we churn one out every 2 weeks and as of right now we are prioritizing overlord and will do all but 3 due to personal preference of the team. New releases will have a similar disclaimer but I didn't want to re upload these.

That world item is probably just complete trash or incredibly good I'm going to assume it's reusable and acts as a character respec which lets you change your race, race levels, and race-specific occupations. If that's how it acts then its probably a build ruining meme item. But if it lets you keep the levels put into race-specific occupations and race levels it's completely broken because it lets the user have the abilities of a race and race-specific occupation without any of the downsides. Like for example, the undead class has a super long list of all sorts of weaknesses like fire and blunt damage weakness. But if the item lets you change your race and you were still able to keep your race-specific occupations like Overlord in Einz's case which is a heteromorph and undead only class/occupation. Or Einz's race levels in undead as a lich then it's just a game-breaking overpowered item that lets you basically be undead without any of the weakness.
Oh my god this actually killed me the plot is so good but because it's Einz it's so unintentionally funny.
Sorry for the re -upload, did not have credit to translation(I didn’t upload the first one)
Btw very wholesome, really gud.
